title: of that section as they relate to the State bodies to which the following order
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order allows for meetings to be held remotely by regional assemblies. Any 
decision made or vote taken or other act done at such a meeting shall be as good 
and effectual as a decision made or vote taken or other act done by the members 
concerned would have been if such a meeting of them had been held in person. 

The arrangements that apply for the regulation of meetings are matters for 
members to determine subject to the provisions of Part 5 of the Local 
Government Act 1991 (Regional Assemblies) (Establishment) Order 2014. 

The regional assemblies established at the time of the making of this Order are 
– 

The Eastern and Midland Regional Assembly 

The Northern and Western Regional Assembly 

The Southern Regional Assembly
